ComicInfo.Summary:
Frank "Madman" Einstein has found himself in an alien dimension with more questions than answers.
The big questions:
Will he ever see the love of his new life, Josephine Lombard ever again? And more importantly, did she ever really even exist? Or has she only ever been a figment of his throbbing brain? Frank must begin a maze-like journey in order to find his way back to the "Snap City" universe. Mr. Excitement, Frank's childhood hero, makes his ghostly official debut. Thrills, chills, and spills await you!
ComicInfo.Title: Is There Anybody Out There?
